TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Barrier extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 允許多項工作在多個階段中以平行方式來合作處理某個演算法。

span.span: Enables multiple tasks to cooperatively work on an algorithm in parallel through multiple phases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一組工作合作移動一系列的階段，每個群組中表示已抵達在給定的階段，並隱含地等待其他所有項目抵達。A group of tasks cooperate by moving through a series of phases, where each in the group signals it has arrived at the in a given phase and implicitly waits for all others to arrive. 相同可以用於多個階段。The same can be used for multiple phases. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用屏障：The following example shows how to use a barrier: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Barrier#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.barrier/cs/barrier.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Barrier#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.barrier/vb/barrier.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有的 public 和 protected 成員的是安全執行緒，而且可用來同時從多個執行緒，除了 Dispose，才必須是會使用上的所有其他作業已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The number of participating threads.

Public Sub New (participantCount As Integer, postPhaseAction As Action(Of Barrier))

span.span: The number of participating threads.

param.name: postPhaseAction
param.span: 要在每個階段之後執行的 。

span.span: The to be executed after each phase.

param.span: 可以傳遞 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 Nothing) 表示不執行任何動作。

span.span: null (Nothing in Visual Basic) may be passed to indicate no action is taken.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `postPhaseAction`之後所有參與者都到達屏障在其中一個階段中，將執行委派。The `postPhaseAction` delegate will be executed after all participants have arrived at the barrier in one phase. 下一個階段 postPhaseAction 委派完成執行之前，不會釋放參與者。The participants will not be released to the next phase until the postPhaseAction delegate has completed execution.

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 32,767.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int64 AddParticipant() cil managed

summary.span: 通知 ，表示還會有一個其他參與者。

span.span: Notifies the that there will be an additional participant.

returns.span: 新參與者將第一次參與其中的屏障階段編號。

span.span: The phase number of the barrier in which the new participants will first participate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屏障正在執行後階段動作，此呼叫會封鎖後階段動作完成，然後再屏障已移動到下一個階段。If the barrier is currently executing a post phase action, this call is blocked until the post phase action completes and the barrier has moved on to the next phase.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 加入參與者會造成屏障的參與者計數超過 32,767。

span.span: Adding a participant would cause the barrier's participant count to exceed 32,767.
-or-

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.

summary.span: 取得屏障目前階段的編號。

span.span: Gets the number of the barrier's current phase.

value.span: 傳回屏障目前階段的編號。

summary.span: 將 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源釋出。

span.span: Releases resources used by the current instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: true 表示釋放 Managed 與 Unmanaged 資源，false 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分的成員，Dispose 不是執行緒安全，而且不能與這個執行個體的其他成員同時使用。Unlike most of the members of , Dispose is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

span.span: Gets the total number of participants in the barrier.

value.span: 傳回在屏障中的參與者總數。

span.span: Returns the total number of participants in the barrier.

summary.span: 取得在目前階段中尚未發出訊號的屏障中參與者數目。

span.span: Gets the number of participants in the barrier that haven’t yet signaled in the current phase.

value.span: 傳回在目前階段中尚未發出訊號的屏障中參與者數目。

span.span: Returns the number of participants in the barrier that haven’t yet signaled in the current phase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這可能是 0，在後續階段動作委派執行期間，或如果 ParticipantCount 為 0。This could be 0 during a post-phase action delegate execution or if the ParticipantCount is 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveParticipants(int32 participantCount) cil managed

param.name: participantCount
param.span: 要從屏障中移除的其他參與者數目。

span.span: The number of additional participants to remove from the barrier.

summary.span: 通知 ，表示會減少一些參與者。

span.span: Notifies the that there will be fewer participants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`participantCount`參與者已經等候屏障、 這項移除作業，可滿足屏障、 執行後階段動作和所有參與者都事項如同正在移除這個參與者必須成功到達屏障。If `participantCount` participants are already waiting on the barrier, this removal fulfills the barrier, the post phase action is executed and all of the participants are woken as if this participant being removed had successfully reached the barrier.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 參與者總數小於指定的

span.span: The total participant count is less than the specified

exception.span: 屏障已經有 0 個參與者。

span.span: The barrier already has 0 participants.
-or-

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.
-or-

exception.span: 目前的參與者計數少於指定的 participantCount

span.span: current participant count is less than the specified participantCount

summary.span: 發出訊號，表示參與者已到達屏障，並且在等候所有其他參與者到達屏障。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SignalAndWait() cil managed

summary.span: 發出訊號，表示參與者已到達屏障，並且在等候所有其他參與者到達屏障。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用，屏障目前有 0 個參與者，或者使用該屏障的執行緒數量多於註冊為參與者的數量。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

exception.span: 所有參與執行緒皆已呼叫 SignalAndWait 後，如果從 Barrier 的階段後動作擲回例外，會將例外狀況包裝在 BarrierPostPhaseException 中，並擲回所有參與執行緒。

span.span: If an exception is thrown from the post phase action of a Barrier after all participating threads have called SignalAndWait, the exception will be wrapped in a BarrierPostPhaseException and be thrown on all participating threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SignalAndWait(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed
Public Function SignalAndWait (millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 要等候的毫秒數；若要無限期等候，則為 (-1)。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 發出訊號，表示參與者已到達屏障，並且在等候所有其他參與者到達屏障 (使用 32 位元帶正負號的整數以測量逾時)。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout.

returns.span: 如果所有參與者已在指定時間內達到屏障則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: if all participants reached the barrier within the specified time; otherwise false.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 為 -1 以外的負數，表示無限逾時。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用，屏障目前有 0 個參與者，或者使用該屏障的執行緒數量多於註冊為參與者的數量。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

exception.span: 所有參與執行緒皆已呼叫 SignalAndWait 後，如果從 Barrier 的階段後動作擲回例外，會將例外狀況包裝在 BarrierPostPhaseException 中，並擲回所有參與執行緒。

span.span: If an exception is thrown from the post phase action of a Barrier after all participating threads have called SignalAndWait, the exception will be wrapped in a BarrierPostPhaseException and be thrown on all participating threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SignalAndWait(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function SignalAndWait (timeout As TimeSpan) As Boolean

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，代表等候毫秒數；或是 ，代表無限期等候的 -1 毫秒。

span.span: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 發出訊號，表示參與者已到達屏障，並且在等候所有其他參與者到達屏障 (使用 物件以測量時間間隔)。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well, using a object to measure the time interval.

returns.span: 如果所有其他參與者已達到屏障則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if all other participants reached the barrier; otherwise, false.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 是除了 -1 毫秒以外的負數，表示無限逾時，或是大於 32,767 的逾時。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out, or it is greater than 32,767.

exception.span: 此方法是從 post-phase 動作中叫用，屏障目前有 0 個參與者，或者使用該屏障的執行緒數量多於註冊為參與者的數量。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SignalAndWait (int millisecondsTimeout, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

public: bool SignalAndWait(int millisecondsTimeout, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 要等候的毫秒數；若要無限期等候，則為 (-1)。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.
The to observe.

summary.span: 發出訊號，表示參與者已到達屏障，並且在等候所有其他參與者到達 (使用 32 位元帶正負號的整數以測量逾時)，同時觀察取消語彙基元。

returns.span: 如果所有參與者已在指定時間內達到屏障則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: if all participants reached the barrier within the specified time; otherwise false

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`cancellationToken`訊號花費效果前, 已取消則就會擲回和值不會減少。If the `cancellationToken` was canceled before the signal took effect, then an is thrown and the value is not decreased. 如果`cancellationToken`未取消或已取消訊號生效後再就會減少，而且沒有就會擲回。If the `cancellationToken` is not canceled or is canceled after the signal takes effect then is decreased and no is thrown.
